help.title: Help
help.intro: Tap to copy, double-tap to delete. Import/Export is under ⋯.
help.modeTip: Browse mode hides plus buttons. Tap “＋” to enter edit mode (add/delete/color).
help.groups.longPressCopy: Long-press: copy all tags in this group
help.groups.edit: Edit mode: shows “＋” and enables add/double-tap delete
help.idols.copy: Tap idol name: copy all tags
help.idols.edit: Edit mode: double-tap to delete; tap color dot to change; tap “+” to add tags
help.tags.edit: Edit mode: double-tap tag to delete
help.favorites.copy: Tap blank area: copy all tags
help.favorites.edit: Edit mode: shows “+” to add; double-tap tag to delete
